channel.title: Games You're Excited About
channel.description:
Title says it all. Post what games you're excited about and post news/comments/whatever about it whenever you can.
Mine... [b]Heavy Rain:[/b] [url=https://img36.imageshack.us/i/heavyraind.jpg/][img]https://img36.imageshack.us/img36/7146/heavyraind.jpg[/img][/url] I need to buy at least one game that's based on a new IP to I can say that I'm not contributing to the non-existent downfall of the game's industry. Plus, the demo was great! [b]Splinter Cell: Conviction:[/b] [url=https://img682.imageshack.us/i/splintercellconviction.jpg/][img]https://img682.imageshack.us/img682/337/splintercellconviction.jpg[/img][/url] Is it a true Splinter Cell game? Maybe not. Still, it looks pretty damn awesome if you ask me. My friend's pretty pissed though. [b]Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker:[/b] [url=https://img682.imageshack.us/i/mgspeacewalkery.jpg/][img]https://img682.imageshack.us/img682/8246/mgspeacewalkery.jpg[/img][/url] It's Metal Gear, and does not have [i]"AC!D"[/i], or [i]"Snake's Revenge"[/i], or [i]"Portable Ops"[/i] in the title. 'Nuff said. [b]Halo: Reach:[/b] [url=https://img682.imageshack.us/i/9765.jpg/][img]https://img682.imageshack.us/img682/4379/9765.jpg[/img][/url] It's Halo, and does not have [i]"Wars"[/i], or [i]"Tactical Card Battle Game"[/i], or [i]"Kart"[/i] in the title. 'Nuff said.
Also, I would like to point out that, if you list [i]Half-Life 2: Episode 3[/i], [i]Portal 2[/i], or [i]Black Mesa[/i], I would like to point out that... no one will be impressed. If you're on these forums, it's a [i]pretty[/i] good sign that you're excited about those games, so don't bother posting them.

item.title: Games You're Excited About
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Ha. True.

Read the “DOOM fans” thread, and you’ll understand.

Read full topic

item.title: Games You're Excited About
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

The gameplay wasn’t all that special. Yeah, I know, I sound like a hypocrite for saying that yet liking DOOM and Halo, but both of those games had something about them that made me like them. I don’t get that with Crysis.

So if that’s the case, “You like crysis” is about as a legitimate retort as “You have an opinion”.

Read full topic

item.description:
Some very old rumors have me excited about a semi-unlikely Elder Scrolls V that is supposed to come out in 2010. I don’t care how long it will be i am excited about it. Bethesda is a company i trust to make the next game good with even having seen any media.

item.title: Games You're Excited About
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
Detective Snowman:

Ehhh… I’ve played the demo. I had to go through 30 seconds of just getting out an inhaler and using it with contextual action. Not fun.

Just because you don’t enjoy doing that type of thing doesn’t mean other people don’t. I haven’t played the demo and I’m not because the game is coming out in 2 days anyway and I don’t want to ruin part of the game by playing it.

Read full topic

item.description:
God damn, so many games, so little time and money.
Red Dead Redemption looks pretty neat. I played a little bit of Red Dead Revolver back when it came out, and it was good.This looks pretty awesome, it’s like GTA in the Old West.

item.title: Games You're Excited About
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
1. Aliens vs. Predator
  2. Aliens: Colonial Marines
  3. Mafia II
  4. Black Mesa
  5. Assassin’s Creed II (PC)
  6. Half-Life 2: Episode 3
    (not in any order)

I would say I’m looking forward to Starcraft and Diablo, but that boat has sadly sailed.
